abstract: Simpson Thacher & Bartlett said Thursday that it has hired Stacie McGinn from Bank of America as a specialist in financial services regulation.
snippet: Simpson Thacher & Bartlett said Thursday that it has hired Stacie McGinn from Bank of America as a specialist in financial services regulation.
lead_paragraph: The law firm Simpson Thacher & Bartlett said on Thursday that it had hired a senior Bank of America lawyer as a partner specializing in financial services regulation.

headline.main: Simpson Thacher Hires Senior Bank of America Lawyer

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
